fierily adverb
(RED)
Add to word list

with a bright red colour, like fire: They stood and watched the fierily pink sunset. The plant has distinctive, fierily red petals.
More examplesFewer examplesThe fierily bright image of the house going up in flames stayed with her for years.He blushed fierily at his friend's remarks.

fierily adverb
(FOOD)
in a way that causes a strong burning feeling in the mouth: The restaurant was known for its fierily hot curries. The sauce is relatively mild at first taste, but then hits you fierily.
More examplesFewer examplesNext came a fierily spiced lamb dish that left me almost unable to speak.I particularly enjoy fierily hot mustard on my sausages.
